The overall experience was more than satisfactory.
1. Dental Clinic is pristinely clean.One of the most important features expected in a dental clinic.
2. The doctor is very polite and friendly along with being well versed with the professional nitty gritties.
3. MOST IMPORTANT : GOLD STANDARD DENTISTRY.
Highly recommended.If you chose Dr.Kapil Garg for your dental issues,rest assured that you will be in safe hands!

review:
I was always scared of going to a Dental clinic because of the 'so called' pain involved. But someone recommended Dr Kapil. I am delighted to say that the whole experience was PAINLESS. I was given a fair explanation of the procedure to be done and the time involved.
Dr Kapil & his team deserve all the accolades. Highly recommended !!!

review: Dr. Garg makes sure he listen to you properly and understands the problem and then he comes up with solutions which are best suited for you and explains you nicely about the pros and cons of everything. On the whole I was very happy with my experience with Dr. Kapil Garg and would highly recommend him and City Dental clinic.
Dr. Kapil Garg is a generous and empathetic to his patients. He explained the cause of issue very well. I didn't find him rushing explaining the treatment. I highly recommend visiting the doctor.
